hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Creating unforgettable experiences on the water since 2006

story.title: How It All Began
content: The Yacht Week started with a simple idea: combine the freedom of sailing with the energy of a festival. What began as a small group of friends exploring the Croatian coast has grown into a global community of adventurers.

Today, we host thousands of guests each year across multiple destinations, from the crystal-clear waters of the Mediterranean to the tropical paradise of the Caribbean. Our mission remains the same: to create the most incredible week of your life.

We believe in authentic experiences, genuine connections, and the magic that happens when you combine sailing, adventure, and community. Every week is carefully curated to ensure you have the time of your life.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To create unforgettable sailing adventures that bring people together, celebrate life, and inspire a sense of freedom and adventure. We're not just a travel company—we're a movement.

vibe.title: The Yacht Week Vibe
vibe.content: Imagine waking up to crystal-clear waters, spending your days exploring hidden coves and vibrant ports, and your nights dancing under the stars. That's The Yacht Week. It's adventure meets luxury, freedom meets community, and every moment is designed to be extraordinary.
vibe.imageAlt: Yacht Week guests enjoying sunset on deck

meta.title: How It Works | The Yacht Week
meta.description: Learn how to book your Yacht Week adventure. Simple steps from choosing your destination to setting sail.

hero.title: How It Works
hero.subtitle: Your journey from booking to sailing in simple steps

steps.title: Choose Your Destination
steps.description: Select from our stunning destinations across the Mediterranean, Caribbean, and beyond. Each location offers unique experiences and breathtaking scenery.

steps.title: Pick Your Package
steps.description: Choose the package that suits you—from standard cabins to premium suites. All packages include your yacht, crew, and access to all events.

steps.title: Book Your Spot
steps.description: Secure your place with a deposit. Our team will confirm your booking and send you all the details you need to prepare for your adventure.

steps.title: Get Ready to Sail
steps.description: Receive your welcome pack, connect with your crew and fellow guests, and get ready for the week of a lifetime.

steps.title: Set Sail & Explore
steps.description: Arrive at your destination, meet your crew, and embark on an unforgettable week of sailing, exploring, and celebrating.

weekOverview.title: What Your Week Looks Like
weekOverview.description: Every Yacht Week is unique, but here's what you can expect:

highlights.title: Welcome & Departure
highlights.description: Meet your crew and fellow guests, stock up on supplies, and set sail to your first destination.

highlights.title: Sailing & Exploring
highlights.description: Sail between stunning locations, anchor in hidden coves, explore local towns, and enjoy beach parties and exclusive events.

highlights.title: Final Celebration
highlights.description: Return to port for a final celebration, share stories with new friends, and plan your next adventure.

options.title: Available Options
options.description: Customize your experience with our range of options:

items.title: Yacht Types
items.description: Choose from monohulls, catamarans, and luxury yachts. All yachts are fully equipped and professionally maintained.

items.title: Cabin Options
items.description: Select from standard shared cabins, private cabins, or premium suites. All accommodations are comfortable and well-appointed.

items.title: Add-Ons
items.description: Enhance your experience with extras like premium food packages, water sports equipment, or private chef services.

items.title: Group Bookings
items.description: Book an entire yacht for your group of friends, family, or colleagues. Perfect for special occasions and celebrations.
